title: Lawns for ceremony shall be 0
clause_text: Lawns for ceremony shall be 0.8 ha. with FSI of 0.10. Area for parking shall be 40% of gross area.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
